I love anime, poetry, JtHM, YouTube, and satire. Lowest grade (in a core subject) is 100 and highest is 117. I take all advanced/college level classes (in HS) and speak multiple languages, even though I'm too shy to talk usually. About to go on my first date ever with a guy from my d&d group.
She thinks the whole office orbits around her. Roast Her!
